title: KitchenArt 32000  Gourmet ButterMate, White
description: For 18 years KitchenArt has played a vital role in the kitchen gadget industry by providing award winning products. KitchenArt continues to offer sleek and modern designs and will continue to bring innovative products that will benefit kitchens worldwide. The Buttermate Pro measures and dispenses pats of butter from one sliver up to eight tablespoons. Simply adjust the Slider to your desired measurement and press to dispense. Includes Two measuring scales for both East and West coast sizes. These scales are marked in both tablespoon and teaspoon increments and conveniently features a conversion to cup measurements. The unit stores conveniently in the refrigerator door, no more messy wax paper or foil wrappers!!
